Name: Bad Bots Battle Arena
About the game: Welcome to Mini battle bot championship. Bad Bots Battle Arena is minibots & robot fighting game where you have to kill other mega bots enemies/Boss to win the fight. Enroll yourself in battlebot style in robot fighting arena to win championship. Enter into robot battle arena and matched with opponents, to have endless robot fight. Enjoy real bad bot fighting. Enemies are more powerful and they can kill you, don’t let them kill you activate well timed boosters like aim lock, air strikes and shield to protect yourself. You have different weapons like Laser gun, Plasma gun, Galting gun and Rocket launcher to attack. Be the part of this awesome robot battle arena championship. Earn and Collect points in Bad Bots Battle Arena and unlock more epic armored weapons to get high rank in bots fight. It’s an amazing bot fighting game, be prepared and quip your robotics battle machine with craziest, most brutal weapons. Features for Bad Bots Battle Arena • High Quality Graphics • Astonishing But Realistic Sound Effects • Exciting Battlebot Fighting Experience With Parts Destruction • More than 3 Robots and multiple weapons. • Training mode to train yourself. Play for hours and never get bored with Bad Bots Battle Arena.
